EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The 2011-12 season of the Moscow Youth Basketball League will kick-off with player Evaluation Day on SUNDAY, OCTOBER 23rd.
Teams will be chosen after Evaluation Day, and games will begin on November 13, after the mid-term break. The Grade K-1 Division will not have evaluations; they will begin play on November 13.
Games normally will be played on Saturdays at the Anglo-American School, although we sometimes must play on Sundays due to the school's needs (including the first three weeks). No games will be scheduled during AAS school holiday periods.
We are planning to have four Divisions based on grade levels. The currently planned schedule of play on game days is :
Grades K-1 - will play in the South Gym from 10 am to 11:15 amGrades 2-3 - will play in the South Gym from 11:30 am to 2:30 pmGrades 4-5 - will play in the North Gym from 1 pm to 4 pm Grades 6-8 - will play in the North Gym from 10 am to 1 pm
This schedule may change based on the number of players who sign-up in each Division.
Game days will be:
Oct. 23 (Sunday) - Evaluation Day Nov. 13 (Sunday) - Team practices / Scrimmage games Nov. 20 (Sunday) Nov. 26 Dec. 3 Dec. 10 Jan. 15 (Sunday) Jan. 21 Jan. 28 Feb. 4 Feb. 11 Mar. 4 (Sunday) Mar. 10 Mar. 17 Mar. 24 Mar. 31 - Championship Tournament
The Registration Fees for the 2011-2012 season are:
4,500 Rubles for Grades 2 - 8 2,500 Rubles for Grades K-1
The Registration Form is attached. (It also is available on the AAS website.) Please complete a separate Registration Form (both sides) for each child, place the form and the Registration Fee in a sealed envelope, and deliver to the cashier's desk in the Administrative Office at AAS before Friday, October 21st, or bring it to the gym on Evaluation Day (October 23rd). A 500 RUBLE LATE FEE will apply to Registration Forms and Registration Fees received after October 23rd. No child will be permitted to play unless and until the completed Registration Form (with the Release signed) is received and the Registration Fee is paid.
MYBL relies on parents and volunteers to work! If you are interested in coaching your child's team, please indicate that interest on the Registration Form. If you or your employer is interested in sponsoring the league or a team, please send an email to MYBL atmoscowbasketball@gmail.com. If you have moved, or if your child is no longer eligible to play or interested in playing, please let us know and we will remove your name from the mailing list. Please share this information with anyone else who may be interested in participating in the MYBL season! Here's hoping everyone has a great season! MYBL
